code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[FinTech_AuthVault]
    C1[FinTech_AuthVault]
    C2[FinTech_LedgerService]
    C3[FinTech_AuthVault]
    C4[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    C5[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
  end

  subgraph Server[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    S1[FinTech_LedgerService]
    S2{FinTech_TransactionQueue}
    S3[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    S4[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    S5[FinTech_LedgerService]
    S6[FinTech_AuthVault]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[FinTech_FraudDetection]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[FinTech_AuthVault] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
